references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of computer-aided synthesis planning, introducing the concept of retrosynthetic analysis.

references.paper_title: Planning chemical syntheses with deep neural networks and symbolic AI
references.reason: This work is highly influential in the application of deep learning to retrosynthesis, pioneering the use of neural networks for navigating the combinatorial space of chemical reactions.

references.paper_title: Depth-First Proof-Number Search with Heuristic Edge Cost and Application to Chemical Synthesis Planning
references.reason: This paper introduced a novel search algorithm that improves the efficiency of finding synthetic routes, by combining depth-first search with heuristic cost estimations.

references.paper_title: Retro*: Learning Retrosynthetic Planning with Neural Guided A* Search
references.reason: This work introduced a neural-guided A* search algorithm for retrosynthetic planning, which combines the efficiency of A* search with the power of neural networks for cost estimation.

references.paper_title: Amortized Tree Generation for Bottom-up Synthesis Planning and Synthesizable Molecular Design
references.reason: This work introduced a novel bottom-up approach to synthesis planning, which starts from readily available building blocks and works towards the target molecule, complementing the traditional top-down retrosynthetic approach.
